00209 /*---- Macros for YBOS ------------------------*/
00212 #define SWAP_D2WORD(_d2w) {\
00213   WORD _tmp2;                                    \
00214   _tmp2                 = *((WORD *)(_d2w));     \
00215   *((WORD *)(_d2w))     = *(((WORD *)(_d2w))+1); \
00216   *(((WORD *)(_d2w))+1) = _tmp2;                 \
00217 }

00279 #define EVID_TRINAT
00280 #endif
00281 
00282 #if defined(EVID_TRINAT)
00283 #define YBOS_EVID_EVENT_ID(e)      *((WORD *)(e)+1)
00284 #define YBOS_EVID_TRIGGER_MASK(e)  *((WORD *)(e)+0)
00285 #define YBOS_EVID_SERIAL(e)        *((DWORD *)(e)+1)
00286 #define YBOS_EVID_TIME(e)          *((DWORD *)(e)+2)
00287 #define YBOS_EVID_RUN_NUMBER(e)    *((DWORD *)(e)+3)
00288 #define YBOS_EVID_EVENT_NB(e)      *((DWORD *)(e)+1)
00289 #elif defined(EVID_CHAOS)
00290 #define YBOS_EVID_EVENT_ID(e)      *((WORD *)(e)+3)
00291 #define YBOS_EVID_TRIGGER_MASK(e)  *((WORD *)(e)+2)
00292 #define YBOS_EVID_SERIAL(e)        *((DWORD *)(e)+2)
00293 #define YBOS_EVID_TIME(e)          *((DWORD *)(e)+3)
00294 #define YBOS_EVID_RUN_NUMBER(e)    *((DWORD *)(e)+4)
00295 #define YBOS_EVID_EVENT_NB(e)      *((DWORD *)(e)+0)
00296 #elif defined(EVID_TWIST)
00297 #define YBOS_EVID_EVENT_ID(e)      *((WORD *)(e)+1)
00298 #define YBOS_EVID_TRIGGER_MASK(e)  *((WORD *)(e)+0)
00299 #define YBOS_EVID_SERIAL(e)        *((DWORD *)(e)+1)
00300 #define YBOS_EVID_TIME(e)          *((DWORD *)(e)+2)
00301 #define YBOS_EVID_RUN_NUMBER(e)    *((DWORD *)(e)+3)
00302 #define YBOS_EVID_EVENT_NB(e)      *((DWORD *)(e)+1)
00303 /* frontend name ignored */
00304 #endif

00306 /********************************************************************/
00309 #define YBOS_EVID_BANK(__a, __b, __c,   __d,   __e) {\
00310       DWORD * pbuf;\
00311       ybk_create(__a, "EVID", I4_BKTYPE, &pbuf);\
00312       *(pbuf)++ = (DWORD)__b;\
00313       *(pbuf)++ = (DWORD)__c;\
00314       *(pbuf)++ = (DWORD)__d;\
00315       *(pbuf)++ = (DWORD)ss_millitime();\
00316       *(pbuf)++ = (DWORD)__e;\
00317       ybk_close(__a, pbuf);\
00318         }
00319 
00320 /********************************************************************/
00323 #define MIDAS_EVID_BANK(__a, __b, __c,   __d,   __e) {\
00324       DWORD * pbuf;\
00325       bk_create(__a, "EVID", TID_DWORD, &pbuf);\
00326       *(pbuf)++ = (DWORD)__b;\
00327       *(pbuf)++ = (DWORD)__c;\
00328       *(pbuf)++ = (DWORD)__d;\
00329       *(pbuf)++ = (DWORD)ss_millitime();\
00330       *(pbuf)++ = (DWORD)__e;\
00331       bk_close(__a, pbuf);\
00332         }
00333  /* end of ybosmacroh */
